ComicInfo.Summary:
Ryu is being haunted by his inner demons, but Ken arrived to help his friend and take him back to the city. Meanwhile, the tournament has already begun and Bison's display of power put the rest of the world against the wall. Then, the leader of Shadaloo sent his best fighters to take care of the qualifying matches. Sagat went to China, Vega to Japan and Balrog to America. *Street Fighter IV Bonus* :The secret story of Abel
